name: Princess Pony Games - Fun Dress Up Games for Girls
name_original: Princess Pony Games - Fun Dress Up Games for Girls
description:
Turns your Apple TV into a beautiful Fireplace! Enjoy beautiful views on your Apple TV.
A radiant fire to keep you warm on a cold winter night.
Very relaxing to have running in the background while you work or rest.
Enjoy your TV the best content to relax.

Features include:

- Full HD Real fireplace scenes
- All videos sampled to 1920x1080 for Apple TV
- Can be repeated indefinitely
- Made exclusively for Apple TV

A variety of fireplaces are available to suit your mood:

- Stone fireplace
- Classic fireplace
- Large log fireplace
- Arty fireplace
- Campfire

We work very hard to make beautiful apps and always welcome your feedback.
If you have a problem we are always happy to help.

NOTE: This app does not function as the Apple TV screen saver. It must be launched independently like other apps.
